text: Hans Rudhardt (born 17 September 1945) is a German skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1968 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:German male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of West Germany Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1968 Winter Olympics Category:People from Lindau (district)
title: Hans Rudhardt
